summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SmartSignalFX Forex trading platform. Backend APIs mostly functional (89.5% success rate) with signal generation issues. Frontend fully functional with excellent UI/UX and all navigation working correctly.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 500 error due to MongoDB ObjectId serialization issues
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks individual signal generation - core feature not working
critical_bugs.error_details: ValueError: [TypeError("'ObjectId' object is not iterable"), TypeError('vars() argument must have __dict__ attribute')]

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 500 error due to MongoDB ObjectId serialization issues
critical_bugs.error_details: Same ObjectId serialization error as individual signal generation

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and stats
Login page with email/password form and Google OAuth button
Admin login with credentials admin@smartsignalfx.com / AdminFx2024!
Dashboard displays signals with filters (pair, timeframe, type, status)
Signal cards show pair, signal type, confidence, entry/SL/TP levels
Pair Analysis page with price chart and technical indicators
Performance page with win rate stats and history table
Risk Calculator with position size calculation
Admin Panel accessible only by admin users
Admin can view signals and manage users
All navigation between pages working correctly
Filters and controls functional on dashboard
Charts and technical indicators displaying correctly
Authentication flow working for both admin and regular users
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix MongoDB ObjectId serialization issues in signal generation endpoints (/api/signals/generate and /api/admin/signals/generate-batch). The backend is using MongoDB ObjectId which is not JSON serializable. Need to ensure all database queries exclude '_id' field or convert ObjectId to string before returning responses.
